author: Siobhán O'Grady, Teo Armus
title: Live updates: U.S. reports highest daily coronavirus death toll; Wuhan makes a fresh start
description: The daily U.S. death toll surpassed 1,800 on Tuesday, marking a new global high for the number of deaths linked to the virus in a single day. The grim figure emerged as Wuhan, the Chinese city where the outbreak emerged late last year, reopened after nearly 1…
content:
The Chinese city of Wuhan emerged from its 76-day lockdown Wednesday, with 11 million residents able to move around the city and the country provided their government-issued health code shines green.
Wuhan staged a grand light show under the theme Heroic Cit… [+2288 chars]
